contentfulBlogPost.title: Now launching our Tote Bag Competition GoFundMe!

richTextBody.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The Tote Bag Competition is back, and this year, we're bringing a fresh twist! Our event is more than just a competition; it's a movement aimed at spreading awareness about homelessness across Canada. We invite you to be a part of this meaningful initiative by donating whatever amount you can to support the Toronto homeless population.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"To contribute, simply visit our GoFundMe page, ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://gofund.me/1d1da200"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"BTO Care Package Fundraiser (https://gofund.me/1d1da200)","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":" to make your contribution.","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" Every dollar counts towards providing essential support and resources to individuals experiencing homelessness. Funds will go towards donations that will be made to homeless individuals or shelters. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"What sets this year's competition apart is the involvement of our executive members. They will be competing to design the tote bag that best addresses the present-day needs of homeless individuals. The winning bag will be used as a template for gathering and creating the tote bags will be we donating out. More information on this will come later.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"By contributing to the Tote Bag Competition, you have the power to deliver a tangible difference in the lives of those in need. Please help share the initiative with friends, family, classmates and colleagues! We hope that you can join us in spreading awareness, showing compassion, and making a differenceâ€”one tote bag at a time. Thank you for your generosity and support!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

childMarkdownRemark.html: Join our Tote Bag Competition & help Toronto's homeless. Donate to our GoFundMe for care packages to make a difference today!
